full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, BLA MA MCHOD PA'I DANG 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYI SLOB MA THA SHAL BA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS 'CHIS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,)
